answer: The remote work policy at GitLab France S.A.S. allows all team members to work 100% remotely, meaning they do not have access to company premises. Remote work can be conducted from the team member's home or another mutually agreed location within French territory. Team members are free to organize their working time within agreed hours (between 9 am and 8 pm) and must maintain communication with their manager. The company provides necessary equipment and covers certain remote work expenses. Compliance with health and safety regulations is required, and team members must notify the company of any changes to their remote work location.
